system.description: You emit a terrible scream that kills creatures that hear it (except for yourself). Creatures closest to the point of origin are affected first. Each living creature in the area that can hear the wail takes 1d6 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d6); a successful Fortitude save negates the damage. A deafened creature is immune to the wail.
system.target: One living creature/level within a 40-ft.-radius spread
